SEARCH
Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.loading.spi

Interface PojoMassLoadingContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
PojoMassIndexingContext
public interface PojoMassLoadingContext
Context exposed to PojoMassLoadingStrategy.

Mappers will generally need to cast this type to the mapper-specific subtype.

See Also:
  • PojoMassIdentifierLoadingContext.parent()
  • PojoMassEntityLoadingContext.parent()
  • PojoMassLoadingStrategy.groupingAllowed(PojoLoadingTypeContext, PojoMassLoadingContext)
